question: Which company produces Eligard?
ideal_answer: Eligard is produced by Astellas Pharma GmbH.

snippets.text: We evaluated the efficacy and tolerability of 3- and 6-month leuprorelin acetate (LA) depot formulations (Eligard®, Astellas Pharma GmbH) in patients with advanced prostate cancer treated in routine clinical practice in Germany.
